name: Scottish Beats

ingredients.item: Beet puree (cooked and peeled beets, pureed)

preparation:
Nodding to the classic Blood & Sand, this drink by Jason Percival, the bar manager at Boston’s Post 390, relies on beets for its dramatic rosy hue and a hint of sweetness.

Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake until chilled.

Double-strain into a coupe or cocktail glass.
